
# Eurostat 

## Total catches 

Description about the data source. 

```{r}
CLToT <- CL %>%
  distinct() %>% # remove after I have multiple years 
  group_by(CLlandingCountry, CLyear) %>%
  summarise(CLofficialWeight = sum(CLofficialWeight, na.rm = TRUE)/1000,
            CLscientificWeight = sum(CLscientificWeight, na.rm = TRUE)/1000) 

eurostatW <- mutate(eurostatW, time = as.character(time))

eurostatComp <- left_join(eurostatW, CLToT, by = c("time"  ="CLyear", "geo" = "CLlandingCountry"))

eurostatComp <- select(eurostatComp, geo:CLscientificWeight) %>%
  rename(CLlandingCountry = geo,
         CLyear =  time, 
         EurostatWeight = values)
```

```{r}
eurostatComp1 <- gather(eurostatComp, WeightSource, Weight, -CLyear, -CLlandingCountry)
ggplot(eurostatComp1, aes(CLyear, Weight, fill = WeightSource)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +
  ylab("Weight (t)")
```
